item.title: 备忘docker-compose部署命令
item.description: 写在前面 在区块链开发中，有很多很麻烦的环境需要部署。这时候docker容器就派上了用场。因为有很多参数，有很多不同的版本，也有go,pyth

item.title: 备忘docker常用命令
item.description: centos6安装docker Add the EPEL Repository Docker is part of Extra Packages for Enterprise Linux (EPEL), which is a community repository of non-standard packages for the RHEL distribution. First, we’ll install the EPEL repository: rpm -iUvh http://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/6/x86_64/epel-release-6-8.noarch.rpm Then, as a matter of best practice, we’ll update our packages: yum
